StreamQ
=======

Stream Q is an online forms generator, can be used to generate list of questions.

Functionality
-------------
    - Any one should be able to create new forms, add questions and get response back
    - should be able to grant/revoke permissions to edit the forms,
    - Should be able to generate a unique forms that can be accessed by either everyone/specific set of user 
    - should be able to configure the forms
        - time limit for the forms
        - options to jumble the questions
        - options to jumbe the options in case of MCQ
        - options to evaluate the results
        - export the result.
        - set a question bank and choose n number for questions only to display
    
    -A chat bot will be great here when used for cases like Interview.
